channel.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
channel.description:
when i click compile it says
'the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue...'
if i click on edit, my compiler says
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
i looked onto add and remove programs and it says that i got java (tm) 6 update 2.
this is in my java folder..
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mbom0i.jpg[/img]
what do i need to do so my compiler works??
i then tried this compiler -
[code]@echo off javac *.java pause[/code]
but i get this when i try to compile.
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue..
this is what my enviroment variables look like and what is in them.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1174fhe.jpg[/img]
classpath
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
path
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;
please help. thanks,

item.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.source: How i fix this? ugh please someone help

item.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

my classpath:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

go to my computer, then properties, then advanced, then enviromental variables, then in the top 1 add

CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

save, close, then compile

Read full topic
item.source: How i fix this? ugh please someone help

item.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:8, topic:257212”]try this code for ur compiler

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]

i know that my path and classpath are wrong, please can you tell me what i need to put in them for my java.?

thanks,

Read full topic
item.source: How i fix this? ugh please someone help

item.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

try this code for ur compiler

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

item.title: How i fix this? ugh please someone help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Bevis, post:4, topic:257212”]that happened to me, you have to change the path, in the enviroment tables, to
C:windows\system32;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin
i think[/quote]

i added that into the path and ok’d it.

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:5, topic:257212”]Fix your damn path.

@echo off title compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause
Took me a second to write[/quote]

i changed my compiler to that and now i just get
’ the system cannot find the path specified’
press any key to continue…

-.-

Read full topic
